message.entry: Action is not supported for action type specified for the target ''{0}''.
Date ''{0}'' is being canceled, however, it has one or more existing dependency ''{1}''.
Date ''{0}'' is not supported in composed expression.
Specified logical operation ''{0}'' is not supported in this schedule context.
Specified logical operation ''{0}'' is not supported for clock, rates or dates that are not timer driven.
An attempt was made to schedule non-finite time {0} as the stepping time of the simulation at time {1}. Simulation can only take finite steps.
The start time or period {1} specified for date ''{0}'' is non finite or negative. Set the period and start time to a strictly positive finite value.
Date ''{0}'' being released has registered actions. The date semantics can change on release and hence, actions are not allowed for a date being released. Cancel the actions before release.
A scheduled time {0} is less than the current simulation time {1}. This request was made by ''{2}''.
Previously scheduled time {0} was not found.

A subscription request was made on clock or sequence ''{0}'' for topic ''{1}''. This topic is either not supported by the object or does not make sense in its context (for example, subscribed state cannot be reached by that object).
Timed date could not be created: {0}.
Timed date implementation having the identifier ''{0}'' does not support appending time.
